name: Pivot Point Alpha
description:
My first VR interaction & algorithmic animation demo, to show potential collaborators.  No audio.

4 'dancers' moving in subtly different ways; try to find the 'pivot' dancer.  If you can point and click with your right controller, more dancers will spawn.  And again.

Developed in Unreal 4 using Visual studio, C++, SteamVR and a Valve Index.

If you can get this to run, please let me know what your rig is.
Oculus version soon hopefully.
